contentParagraphs: Acted as the Technical Consultant in a fully remote distributed team at the startup company for the video-based educational platform. The solution includes an administrator panel, customer web application, and REST API based on the Ruby On Rails / NextJs framework. Worked as a fullstack developer as part of a 4 people team on the solution for the marketing website using the NextJs framework.

The Skills is an online sports education platform where athletes teach online courses in their field of expertise. The platform instructors are some of the most talented people in their fields. Unfortunately, many students never have the opportunity to use them for a variety of reasons. They believe that the convergence of these communities has asignificant impact on amplifying the voice of, and adding value to, all members. The Skill aims to help transfer knowledge and insights from its instructors to learners and across the community as a whole.
